---
category: news
title: "The Quality of Your Coffee May Soon Be Determined by a Robot"
excerpt: "The days of experts gathering in a sealed-off room to sip coffee and grade beans on their color, aroma and taste may be numbered. Demetria, a Colombian-Israeli company developed an artificial intelligence data platform that can determine the quality of beans when used with hand-held sensors."
